titles.title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to exclude affiliates and subsidiaries of insured depository institutions in the definition of deposit broker, and for other purposes.
Brokered Deposit Affiliate-Subsidiary Modernization Act of 2018
Brokered Deposit Affiliate-Subsidiary Modernization Act of 2018
Brokered Deposit Affiliate-Subsidiary Modernization Act of 2018
Brokered Deposit Affiliate-Subsidiary Modernization Act of 2018
Brokered Deposit Affiliate-Subsidiary Modernization Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 34 - 17.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 115-1096.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 848.
